description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 22/01359/FUL (Demolition of existing Hawks Road Clinic to provide two buildings comprising flexible Use Class E and F2 floorspace and 125 Use Class C3 residential apartments, landscaping, parking facilities, cycle parking facilities, servicing, access and associated public realm improvements.). Drawing substitutions pertaining to elevational changes
decision_conditions: Condition 2: The following approved drawings: Proposed North Elevation 21020-FA-302 P5Proposed South Context Elevation 21020-FA-303 P6Proposed East Elevation - Block A 21020-FA-304 P5Proposed West Elevation - Block A 21020-FA-305 P5Proposed East Elevation - Block B 21020-FA-306 P4Illustrative Landscape Masterplan L025-P-001Proposed Ground Floor Plan 21020-FA-101 P7Landscape Levels StrategyL025-P-005/Proposed Site Plan 21020-FA-001 P7Are replaced with: Block A & B North Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-002 (rev P2)Block A & B South Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-003 (rev P4)Block A East Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-004 (rev P3)Block A West Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-005 (rev P3)Block B East Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-006 (rev P2)Block B West Proposed Elevation 2114-5PA-PL-ZZ-DR-A-007 (rev P2)General Arrangement - Landscape Plan 2114-CAM-03-ZZ-DR-L-0001 (rev C04)General Arrangement - Levels Study 2114-CAM-03-ZZ-DR-L-0021 (rev C04)Block A & B Level 00 Site Plan 2114-5PA-02-Z00-DR-A-100 (rev C02)
